mapper.update: update user set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passWord = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avator = #{avator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wexID = #{wexid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loveIndex = #{loveindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userName, passWord, avator, wexID, qq, phoneNumber, loveIndex, level, signature from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, userName, passWord, avator, wexID, qq, phoneNumber, loveIndex, level, signature from user
